website_summaries.verdict: A great-smelling sulfate-free shampoo that's affordable and works well for most hair types. The shampoo and conditioner combo is an even better value.
pros: Contains honey extract and vitamin B to nourish hair and leave it feeling soft and manageable
Has a lovely botanical scent that isn't overpowering
Comes in a large bottle for a good price
No parabens, mineral oil, or dyes
cons: Can be difficult to rinse out
Some users with color-treated hair report that color fades faster than usual

customer_reviews.title: Hard to rinse out!
customer_reviews.text: At first I absolutely loved this shampoo and conditioner. After about 3 uses it is impossible to wash out. It leaves my hair super greasy and oily looking? I have thick, color treated hair and I have never had this problem with a product before this. I have tried using less and even omitting the conditioner altogether and still oily, greasy look and feel. I have used herbal essences for years but will not buy this specific product again
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE DO NOT USE,  DRIES OUT HAIR AND STRIPS COLOR
customer_reviews.text: Its nice to find a sulfate free product that doesn't cost an arm and a leg. I thought I had to use a little more than normal shampoo to get it to lather but the conditioner works well.... I like it better than the WEN I was buying... at least this makes my hair feel clean and gets the hair spray out UPDATE: AFTER A FEW WEEKS OF USE I THOUGHT THE WEATHER WAS DRYING MY HAIR OUT. IT WAS THOSE PRODUCT. I QUIT USING IT AND CHARGED TO SOMETHING DIFFERENT AND MUT HAIR IS BACK TO NORMAL AGAIN. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT FOR ANYTHING OTHER THAN EMERGENCY USE. IT WAS STRIPPING MY COLOR ALSO
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Mohler

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I was told that this was a good shampoo for helping with greasy hair. Instead, my hair literally feels greasy even when it's wet, and when it's dry, it looks like my hair is still wet. I do not recommend AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Renyer

customer_reviews.title: Not a clean rinse
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the product reviews on the “leaving hair greasy” was a lie. But it sadly wasn’t. Even without using conditioner it still left my hair extremely greasy and not feeling clean. The scent is nice and the product feels nice too. But it doesn’t rinse clean at all.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes and help control frizz
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo and conditioner!!! I don’t have color treated hair, but I bought it because it’s sulfate free, which is important to me because I have thick, wavy/curly hair that gets extremely frizzy during summer. I wash my hair every other day, and use coconut oil after. This has definitely helped calm my hair and moisturize it it also smells amazing! I only rated it a 4 because it’s a little hard to work through my hair (bc it’s sulfate free), but other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Iame Rea

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because it is sulfate free
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i have color treated hair and wanted something to keep the color going strong. I have to say it smells great and my hair feels great but the color drained right out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for drying your hair out and stripping moisture
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 2 weeks and the 1st week I noticed my hair getting super dry. The 2nd week my fiancee and I started to notice how dry and dead our hair feels. I started to get dry scalp again....says no sulfates but feels like we have been washing our hair with salt water shampoo and brine conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: HaV0K8Z3rO

customer_reviews.title: Great for my coarse, grey hair.
customer_reviews.text: These products are very nice. Leaves my coarse grey hair feeling silky and soft and more manageable. Very nice scent, too. Not a bad value for your money. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Stripped the color out and leaves it greasy
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this make of shampoo and conditioner 15 years ago but this stuff is awful now. It stripped the color out of my hair the first time I used it and it leaves it a stringy mess. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: Moisture and beautiful scent
customer_reviews.text: I bleach my hair pretty regularly this sulfate free shampoo and conditioner helps make it feel like hair again much more manageable and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sulfate free, great lather, cleans and moisturizes well... and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product. Smells great like all Herbal Essences products and does a great job of cleaning and moisturizing my hair. I use it on days I just need a gentle wash and don't have too much buildup. It is sulfate free so you know it's not harsh. Plus shampoo is EWG VERIFIED! Bought some for my mom since I liked it so much :)
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why they don’t sell this in grocery stores but I love this stuff. If you’re looking for sulfate free shampoo and conditioner that doesn’t break the bank, this is the product for you. Affordable, smells great, and does its job. 100% would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Color safe for the most part
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I bought this shampoo + conditioner set is because I dye my hair using natural henna. One of the instructions for henna is to use a shampoo without sulfates to protect the hair and the color. I felt like this one was a great investment since it came with conditioner as well. I have to say, I'm pretty impressed. A little color bleed is normal when using red dye, but it's significantly less bleed when I use this shampoo. So far the deepness of the color appears to be lasting longer which will save me some effort to re-dye my hair more frequently. My hair comes out very soft too!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Just fabulous! Cleans well. Conditioner is amazing leaving my long hair soft and shiny! Great price. Lightly scented. Will be reordering this duo and trying others in this line of no sulfate products.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Itchy scalp & hair loss
customer_reviews.text: For starters I have really long thick Latina hair and I wanted something that would moisturize my hair. I started noticing my hair pretty much shedding everywhere! The amount of hair in my brush was gross, and to add to this, my scalp was just itchy and flaky all the time. Note that I do live in a dry climate but the only thing different was me trying this shampoo & conditioner out. Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: ☹
customer_reviews.text: The scent is way to strong. It took 3 additional washes to get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Leave My Hair Feeling Soft
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair so I've been going through this product pretty fast. The shampoo and conditioner leave my hair feeling oily and gross, not soft and moisturized at all. I like the scent a lot, and as someone with colored hair I'll say it's been very good at not washing away the color. But the greasy feeling of my hair after using it is a huge downside, so I will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: It is very thick & rich. Moisturizes very well. Leaves hair shiny & soft. Scent is extremely strong but Im sensitive to smells & triggers migraines. Would b nice if caps were a different color for people who wear glasses. I couldn't read which is shampoo or conditioner. Although shampoo is clear & conditioner is white. Once in ur hand if u get wrong 1 u need 2take lid off & scrape it back n. I get compliments on how pretty my hair looks & smells tho
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at good price
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to find a sulfate free shampoo and conditioner that makes your hair feel soft. This one not only does the job it’s also paraben free and dye free which is great because dyes sometimes make my scalp itch, and parabens are not good for you... added bonus, it is much more affordable than most sulfate free hair products!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Perez

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good shampoo and conditioner. Leaves my hair moisturized and soft. My only issue is the smell.....it’s awful. It’s not a good honey smell like I was expecting. It’s a fake floral fragrance that I find a little nauseating. Will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Sachak

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shampoo and conditioner but I found it to not be as moisturizing as I thought it would have been. I honestly don’t know if I would buy this again, it smells so good but I need something much more conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely scent, really cleanses my scalp, gets out the castor oil quickly, but my scalp feels dry. Love that this is EWG certified, though confused how as the ingredients label lists fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Rosselli

customer_reviews.title: I will be reordering soon.
customer_reviews.text: I live this product. Its gentle on colored hair and leaves my hair feeling silky. The bottles came in a tape joined package . The fragrance if lovely . I will be reordering soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo/conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s EWG certified, smell is nice but not overpowering
customer_reviews.author: Finse

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the picture
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I opened the package 📦 because it was really small. I was expecting the shampoo and the conditioner to be way bigger but it was a decent price. I think I am too used to buy on costco Anyways, the results are not great either pretty average shampoo and conditioner, the smell 2 hours at most. If you catch this on sale maybe be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a greasy film in my hair no matter how much I rinse. Would not recommend. The only positive is that I like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Brittini

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.....
customer_reviews.text: Aggghhhh I tried to like it. I wanted a sulfate free cheap shampoo. I got what a paid for. No hate though.. my son and husband will gladly use it.. my hair felt terrible after using this product.. but it is color treated and maybe a little dry... so for the price, it could work for you?
customer_reviews.author: SelinaR

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Maintain Color
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a try and have been using it for about two weeks after coloring. Im pleased with this shampoo/conditioner and will continue use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DianaX

customer_reviews.title: Great value for amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and conditioner I’m a repeat buyer awesome smell and great feeling to my hair hard to find shampoo that’s sulfate free for this price
customer_reviews.author: Kerin S

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to find a good quality sulfate free shampoo from a well known brand. Smells wonderful and hair is super soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The only shampoo which works on my blonde dyed hair
customer_reviews.text: After trying tons of different shampoos, this is the only one which actually worked for me. I have colored hair to blonde and it is so hard to take care of it. However this shampoo really makes hair softener
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5!
customer_reviews.text: Good product specially the conditioner! But it may not be a good option if you have keratin treated hair and you are looking for a sulfate free shampoo. After 3 weeks you feel it starts washing the keratin product away from your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this as I haven’t loved this brand in the last but I bought this and love it. Works great on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great for softness in platinum hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for something that would be gentle on my platinum hair to counter all the purple shampooing and bleaching it has gone through. Definitely makes my hair softer and the smell is so pleasant, without being too strong. I haven't noticed it dulling my hair or leaving it waxy like other reviewers have said, but I do have bleached hair so I appreciate the added moisture.
customer_reviews.author: corrine nief

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected!! My official go to! Best texture, scent and results!!! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is so picky on her sulfate free shampoos and loves this one. Just wish it did more for frizz. It smells so good too
customer_reviews.author: nanni hager

customer_reviews.title: Great item price and what it does for your hair 😀
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy salon shampoo and conditioner. I saw them talk about this on The Today show. Great product and price. My hair likes it too
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: Buy it try it bottles big and useful
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo feels clean and leaves my hair bouncy after smelling amazing as well
customer_reviews.author: Liizz_Legiit

customer_reviews.title: Not filled all the way
customer_reviews.text: I was feeling both bottles to see if they were filled properly Becasue some reviews said they weren't filled all the way. The conditioner bottle was filled all the way. The shampoo bottle was not :/ I feel like the person who sends them out dumps out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair greasy
customer_reviews.text: This left my hair feeling and looking greasy no matter how little I used or how long I rinsed. I do not recommend this for people with fine hair. It literally took two days and a clarifying shampoo to get rid of the greasy appearance and feeling.
customer_reviews.author: C Str

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: If your area has hard water, this seems to help. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned27

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo and conditioner. I ordered it a month ago and I’m still going with the same bottles. The smell is sweet and my hair feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the this is EWG certified and works well! It smells great and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell......
customer_reviews.text: Is very nice and it is works very well for my hair!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CGriffin

customer_reviews.title: bit worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is their regular supermarket size, and at $7 each after a big discount is not exactly a steal. it’s moisturizing etc but nothing special. Herbal Essences used to make the best scents, now it’s just cheap shampoo loaded with artificial smells. i regret buying this product at this price. cheaper shampoos are doing much better job with my hair
customer_reviews.author: Severine

customer_reviews.title: Nice! My scalp feels invigorated!
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels and smells great and whatever they put in it also feels cooling like a,mint or something! I LOVE that it is sulfate and paraben free. Due to researching causes of my hair loss, I am throwing out major irritants like sulfates and endocrine disruptors like parabens!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Could have been bigger bottles for the price but, I needed it asap soit will work. Highly allergic to sulfate so hoping this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Blanchfield

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for an inexpensive non-toxic shampoo and conditioner for a while and this is great and it smells great! A+
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Works well but lacks moisture
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge problem with my hair falling out but this is the first shampoo and conditioner that stopped my problem! My hair fall put 99% less now. The scent is so pleasant but it dries out ny hair pretty bad. For me it's a good trade off though to not have my hair fall out so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Greasy!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if its my hair or what but this shampoo makes my hair very greasy. I only use it once a week and when I do my hair looks terrible. I thought maybe I wasn't rinsing it all out so i rinsed and rinsed and still no. Then my daughter started using it and her hair came out greasy as well. It smells really good though! I love Herbel Essence but I won't buy this type again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Channell

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about it. It wasn’t terrible but as a curly hair girl it felt like it dried my hair a bit. The smell is wonderful though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: It will make your hair stink.
customer_reviews.text: Wish i looked at the reviews before purchasing. Smells horrible, the conditioner doesn't soften hair. Product is wack, disappointed in the purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good. Cleans my hair without overly stripping it, adds moisture back with the conditioner, isn't too expensive and does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Williams

customer_reviews.title: GOOD ONE
customer_reviews.text: I like it. And it does not make the color fade like some shampoos. great price from amazon club versus purchasing it at the salon
customer_reviews.author: shanliang

customer_reviews.title: Great Products!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the shampoo and condition leave my hair. It smells amazing and the results are silky smooth and shiny. I was looking for a combo that had no sulfates, parabens, etc. and this was a great choice and was cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Tervon Walton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really good Not to smelly Softened my hair I have thick hair So works for me
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Made hair greasy/oily, stringy, and did more damage then good
customer_reviews.text: The scent was nice but it overly stripped my hair. Not moisturizing at all. It left the majority of my hair feeling awful yet made my scalp super oily. I normally wash my hair every 3 days and I had to put my hair up in ponytails to stop me from washing it daily.
customer_reviews.author: little me.r

customer_reviews.title: Lacks in the scent and lather category
customer_reviews.text: Found this set lacking in scent, shampoo was rather hard to lather. Overall pretty disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Marina G

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommen
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care for this because it leaves my hair so greasy and just dirty feeling
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: Sulfate Free & Paraben Free
customer_reviews.text: I got these products because I recently had a keratin treatment done on my hair and needed to get shampoo and conditioner that doesn't contain sulfates or parabens. I'm happy so far. There's not a strong scent to these products and the price is much lower here than compared to CVS.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo and conditioner ever
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel, smell, and how nicely my hair styles when drying. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terriscrawford55

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like my hair, made my scalp itch. Bought Aveeno oatmeal shampoo instead; much better product.

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this shampoo and conditioner. It seems to clean well, but my hair is still dry and not as soft as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: S Smyser

customer_reviews.title: Agitated Sensitive Scalp
customer_reviews.text: Agitated my scalp. Lovely scent, but sadly made my scalp itch after 2 washes.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Fuller-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Brand -sulfate free- fresh,  mild scent
customer_reviews.text: Favorite Brand, New fresh mild scent, makes my hair feel so silky but not flat or oily! Great on colored hair!
customer_reviews.author: tony h.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: This excellent shampoo and conditioner smells great and is good for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Pleasure to Use
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and conditioner! The scent is a light vanilla and honey fragrance. Both products are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Broeker

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I liked this shampoo when i had Keratin done. And now Keratin is gone but i am still using it. i love it

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! IT MADE MY HAIR GREASY AND STICKY. Worst shampoo and conditioner I've ever used in my life!
customer_reviews.author: S. George

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: I mean it’s shampoo and conditioner. Not great and not awful. Makes hair hard to brush through though
customer_reviews.author: Abby Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to try this product when I heard it was on the EWG website and also inexpensive. I have been VERy happy with how it works for my hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My wife was told that it is the best hair therapy and she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Nomun Bukh

customer_reviews.text: I’ve got very long hair and thick hair, so far it’s lasted me quite a bit. I recommend this shampoo and conditioner combo!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have really dry and brittle hair. This combo definitely makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Wade

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair and I color treat it. It leaves my hair clean and shiny.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Pantene
customer_reviews.text: Sister loves at she says it's better then pantene highly highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: Smells great leaves hair soft no sulphate That's all I need .

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this shampoo. Felt like I was doing good for my hair. Smell is so good.

customer_reviews.title: Happy to Find a Non-Sulfate Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find a non-sulfate shampoo for my son. It came quickly, smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: jd16153

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that this was not harsh on my hair, smelled good and made my hair really shiny
customer_reviews.author: Jana M. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Left hair greasy.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this but found the shampoo and conditioner combo gave me lifeless hair. By second day my hair was greasy. I do not normally have an issue with greasy hair. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Castle

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair feel so nasty, frizzy, and knotted up!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, not as moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I am trying out the curly girl method recommendations of sulfate free/silicone free products. Unfortunately, it's not quite as moisturizing as I need for my curly hair. I like that it's affordable and smells nice.

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo for colored hair
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best shampoo I have ever used in my colored hair! My color has held up longer and even the red does not bleed!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought lots of organic or natural shampoos and conditioners in the past and these are my favorite so far. They lather really well which I have had a hard time finding in other natural shampoos. It has a nice light smell. Definitely found my new favorite shampoo!

customer_reviews.title: Not good for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Love the conditioner, hate the shampoo. The shampoo leaves an awful residue on my hair and looks greasy immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair feel, smell, and look so wonderful!!! Everyone should use this!!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it makes my hair feel. It also feels clean and light.

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: I really love it!!!! The small is amazing! And for that price it is really good product! Because I was trying to find not expensive sulfate free shampoo and I did it!

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but does not work
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but will NOT make your hair soft at all. Dried my hair so bad
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is paraben free and it still has the components to wash your hair but also moisturize your scalp.

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: Feels soft to the touch and with little to no frizzy.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite shampoo/conditioner right now. I have a hard time finding some that doesn’t dry out my hair and this definitely makes my hair super soft and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Kae

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered. Came on time which pleases me. Always good to change up shampoo and conditioner it’s better for your hair. Scent is soft and not over powering
customer_reviews.author: Kris H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing.. And long lasting.. Made my hair feel fresh and though it's not for dandruff it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Best shampoo I've ever used. I have dry wavy color treated hair. I will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set smells amazing and doesnt weigh my hair down!

customer_reviews.title: So glad
customer_reviews.text: Glad to finally have a hair product free of so many harsh chemicals!

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo/conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice shampoo and condition, smells great and leaves my hair shiny. But I think it makes my hair a bit drier

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: My hair was greasy feeling within a couple hours of using. Will not buy again.

product_meta.title: Herbal Essences, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Kit With Natural Source Ingredients, BioRenew Honey & Vitamin B, Color Safe, 13.5 & 12.2 fl oz, Kit
product_meta.description: Protect your hair color with Herbal Essences Honey & Vitamin B Sulfate-Free Daily Moisture Shampoo. Our real botanicals are endorsed by Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, the world's leading expert on plants. This shampoo, with real botanicals, gently cleanses and protects color-treated hair. Condition hair while protecting its color with Herbal Essences Honey & Vitamin B Sulfate-Free Gentle Daily Moisture Conditioner. Our real botanicals are endorsed by Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, the world's leading expert on plants. This conditioner, with real botanicals, deeply conditions and protects color-treated hair.
feature_bullets: 87% NATURAL ORIGIN SHAMPOO AND 90% NATURAL ORIGIN CONDITIONER made with real botanicals and natural source ingredient materials with limited processing & purified water
MOISTURIZE : This shampoo is crafted without sulfates to gently cleanse, moisturize and safe on color treated hair
HAIR HEALTH ENDORSED BY KEW: The real botanicals in these formulas have been verified by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew
THE SCENT EXPERIENCE: Multilayered scents of honey, jasmine and creamy vanilla
OUR NO, NO, NO LIST: Our Honey & Vitamin B Shampoo and Conditioner are sulfate-free, paraben-free, mineral oil-free, dye-free
You will receive one 12.2 fluid ounce bottle of Shampoo and one 13.5 fluid ounce bottle of Conditioner
